sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The zip package contains zip, zipcloak, zipnote and zipsplit.

sect3.title: zip
sect3.para: zip compresses files into a ZIP archive.

sect3.title: zipcloak
sect3.para: zipcloak is disabled in this version of zip. It will display a message about how to support encryption by recompiling with zcrypt27.zip.

sect3.title: zipnote
sect3.para: zipnote read or writes comments stored in a zipfile .

sect3.title: zipsplit
sect3.para: zipsplit is a utility to split zip files into smaller files.
